articles.title: Kim Jong Un Inspects Islet Defence Detachment
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Inspects Islet Defence Detachment
 Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Marshal Kim Jong Un Monday inspected the Wolnae Islet Defence Detachment, an outpost in the biggest hotspot in the western sector of the front very near from Paekryong Island.
					 He saw children on the islet jumping for joy, taking hands of their mothers and held them in his arms one by one before having a photo taken with them.
					
					 He walked along the lane leading to the detachment and learned in detail about the terrains of the islet, deployment of firepower equipment and the soldiers' living for hours.
					
					 He was briefed on the enemy's situation from the commander of the detachment at the observation post.
					
					 He acquainted himself with the troop deployment and targets of the 6th marine brigade of the south Korean puppet army on Paekryong Island and praised the detachment for being fully ready to go into action in order to cope with the enemy's attempt at provocations.
					
					 He underscored the need to keep increasing the density of fire and steadily modify and supplement the proposal for assignment of fire power duties and use of artillery pieces in order to cope with the enemy's changed troop deployment.
					
					 He specified before the commanding officers of the detachment and the leading members of the artillery unit of the 4th Army Corps of the KPA who accompanied him the order of strike and density of fire for wiping out enemy's targets including radar posts, detectors for artillery pieces, Harpoon launching base, 130mm multiple rocket and 150mm self-propelled howitzer batteries under the 6th marine brigade of the south Korean puppet army.
					
					 He ratified new regulations for naval operation: To fire threatening warning shells when enemy's warships sail close to waters on the extension of the Military Demarcation Line and fire powerful sighting shells to destroy them when they intrude into them.
					
					 He said his inspection of the islet defence detachments stationed in the biggest hotspot was to accurately learn about the combat preparations and finally confirm the order for precision strike at enemy's targets.
					
					 The enemies are on a knife edge for fear of prompt shelling from the KPA, he said, adding that the enemies feel fretful after straining the situation by staging what they called annual drills in the most sensitive waters where the two opposing sides stand in sharp confrontation. 
					
					 As the saying goes that a guy who is fond of playing with fire is bound to perish in flames, all the enemies quite often playing with fire in the sensitive hotspot should be thrown into a cauldron once I issue an order, he said, adding:
					
					 The density of our fire is very high at present and it can strike enemy's targets on Paekryong Island three or four times and turn it into a sea in flames.
					
					 He told the commander of the detachment to photograph enemy's positions engulfed in flames and blown up during a battle and send pictures to the Supreme Command.
					
					 Once an order is issued, you should break the waists of the crazy enemies, totally cut their windpipes and thus clearly show them what a real war is like, he noted.
					
					 As I told commanding officers while inspecting the Jangjae Islet Defence Detachment and the Mu Islet Hero Defence Detachment, if the Supreme Commander issues an order, the artillerymen of the Wolnae Islet Defence Detachment, too, should make the first gun report and signal flare for the great war for national reunification, he stressed.
					
					 Satisfied to see combat positions including the observation post built well in line with the instruction of the Supreme Command on making thorough preparations for all-out action, he said that this detachment is a perfect unit as it has turned into a strike base from a defence one.
					
					 He awarded higher military ranks to the commander and political commissar of the detachment on the spot by an order of the Supreme Commander as they have turned the detachment into an impregnable fortress, unsinkable warship.
					
					 He had a photo taken with Kim Kwang Chol, private third class soldier, on watch duty and commanding officers of the detachment after taking them to his arms.
					
					 He went round soldiers' bed room and education room to take warm care of their living.
					
					  He gave a pair of binoculars and an automatic rifle to the detachment as souvenirs and had a picture taken with soldiers and their families.
					
					 He enjoyed a performance given by the art group of the detachment soldiers on the same day.
					
					 Praising them for giving a good performance and singing songs well, he said this was a model of the Songun culture. He also praised the detachment for conducting well the political and ideological education as intended by the party.
					
					 He was accompanied by Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Kyok Sik, Kim Yong Chol, Pak Jong Chon, Rim Kwang Il and An Ji Yong.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Inspects Long-range Artillery Sub-unit of KPA Unit
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Inspects Long-range Artillery Sub-unit of KPA Unit
 Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un Monday inspected a long-range artillery sub-unit of KPA Unit 641 whose mission is to strike and wipe out the enemies on Paekryong Island.
					 Expressing expectation and conviction that the soldiers of the sub-unit would remain true to the Songun revolutionary leadership of the party, he gave them a pair of binoculars and an automatic rifle as gifts and had a picture taken with them.
					
					 He received a detailed report from the commanding officers on the combat preparedness of the sub-unit.
					
					 He highly praised the sub-unit for having made perfect combat preparations as required by the operational technological plan of the Supreme Command, grasped all enemy targets and waited for the issue of an order to fire.
					
					 Seeing Juche artillery pieces of the sub-unit, he assigned to it the duty to blow up the headquarters of the puppet sixth marine brigade and its affiliated marine battalions through merciless firepower strikes if the enemies on Paekryong Island make a provocation.
					
					 He assessed the time for preparing shooting while guiding the firepower training of the soldiers of the sub-unit.
					
					 After watching the firepower training of the artillerymen, he praised them for being fully prepared to fire shells right now.
					
					 A modern war is an artillery war and the combat preparations of artillerymen is the one of the KPA, he said, setting forth the tasks which would serve as guidelines for making perfect combat preparations of the unit.
					
					 Each day at present is little short of a real war state in the true sense of the word and for the artillerymen to become master cracks is a combat task which brooks no delay, he said.
					
					 He underscored the need to steadily study and round off new artillery war methods of Korean style in line with the improved arms and equipment of the unit and the changing operational scenarios of the enemies, meticulously organize and command artillery operations and combats and thus give fullest play to the might of artillery pieces.
					
					 Saying that he attaches importance to this artillery unit, he underlined the need to deal blows of justice at the enemies through unimaginably deadly strikes and wipe out the group of aggressors to the last man, if they recklessly provoke.
					
					 He looked round the education room and bedroom of a company under the sub-unit to take deep care of the soldiers' living.
					
					 He expressed great satisfaction again over the fact that the commanding officers and soldiers of the units stationed in the western sector of the front have turned all the operation theatres into impregnable fortresses to defend the party, the revolution, the country and its people at the cost of their lives.
					
					 The areas in the western sector of the front are the biggest hotspot where a war can break out right now due to the reckless provocations of the enemies for aggression, he noted, underlining the need to maintain the maximum alert as required by a touch-and-go situation and make powerful retaliatory strikes at the enemies if they intrude into seas of the country even 0.001mm on which the DPRK's sovereignty is exercised.
					
					 He was accompanied by Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Kyok Sik, Kim Yong Chol, Pak Jong Chon, Rim Kwang Il and An Ji Yong.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to Fish Farm
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to Fish Farm
 Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un gave field guidance to the Ryongjong Fish Farm.
					 He said the Ryongjong Fish Farm is a typical fish farm of the Songun era built at the initiative of leader Kim Jong Il and under his energetic guidance.
					
					 He recollected the long and tiresome journeys made by Kim Jong Il, exerting devoted efforts to bring about a fresh turn in fish breeding as required by the new century, saying he could not forget November 21, 2010 when he visited there, accompanying the leader.
					
					 At the general control room he watched the real-time measurement of the quantity, temperature, pH and oxygen content of water in indoor and outdoor fish ponds with the help of computers and underwater cameras' monitoring of  the physiology of fishes.
					
					 What is important in fish breeding is to put fish farming on a scientific basis, he noted, adding this would make it possible to keep fish production going at a high rate.
					
					 He went round the fish ponds built along the water way of the Ryongjong spring.
					
					 He was pleased to watch sturgeons and fishes of various other species in the ponds.
					
					 Watching the Ryongjong spring from which water was flowing into the fish ponds in an endless stream, he recalled that when water stopped gushing out from the spring, service persons and employees of the fish farm turned out to restore it into its original state. Water supply is of particular importance for fish farming, he added. 
					
					 Feasting his eyes at the food factory and protein food factory standing near the outdoor ponds, he said with deep emotion that they were visited by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He said people cannot substantially benefit from fish farms if the supply of food for fishes is not put on a par with fish production no matter how many modern ones are built. 
					
					 Seeing the letters displayed in the compound of the fish farm "Sturgeons go to sea while the DPRK advances into the world", he told the officials to add the letters "Satellites enter space". World-startling miracles are being worked in various parts of the country through a dynamic drive for breaking through the cutting edge under the wise leadership of our party, he added.
					
					 Noting that the Ryongjong Fish Farm is crystal of Kim Jong Il's love for people, he proposed erecting a monument to the undying leadership feats of Kim Jong Il and displaying his portrait in the compound of the farm to convey his loving care to posterity.
					
					 He told the officials and employees of the fish farm to play a pioneer's role in translating the desire of Kim Jong Il to provide the people with more fish into reality.
					
					 He was accompanied by Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Kyok Sik, Kim Yong Chol, Pak Jong Chon, Rim Kwang Il and An Ji Yong.

articles.title: US, S. Korea to Be Held Accountable for Catastrophic Consequences: CPRK
articles.content:
US, S. Korea to Be Held Accountable for Catastrophic Consequences: CPRK
 Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) issued the following statement on Monday:
					 The U.S. and south Korean puppet warmongers finally kicked off Key Resolve joint war maneuvers, the provocative saber-rattling for invading the DPRK, despite its repeated warnings and strong denunciation at home and abroad.
					
					 The madcap joint war maneuvers under way in the sky, ground and seas of south Korea in parallel with Foal Eagle joint war exercises which started on March 1 are participated in by U.S. imperialist aggressor forces, south Korean puppet troops, armed forces of satellite countries including the UK and Australia, U.S. nuclear carrier group, B-52 strategic bombers, F-22 Stealth fighters, Aegis destroyers and other ground, air and naval strike means equipped with nukes and live shells.
					
					 Timed to coincide with the large-scale north-targeted war exercises, the puppet authorities and military gangsters are openly letting loose a spate of provocative outbursts calling for "striking commanding forces and strongholds" and "bringing down the north's regime".
					
					 Such three-dimensional joint war exercises are the most dangerous drills for a nuclear war and most undisguised provocations unprecedented in their nature, scale and the program of their drills.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces are, however, describing the war maneuvers as "annual defensive ones" to cope with the "north's provocation" and "threat".
					
					  Do they have any reason for raising a hue and cry over someone's "threat" and "provocation" while posing a real threat and committing provocations?
					
					 It is the height of shamelessness for the U.S. and its stooges, military gangsters to paint the war exercises for aggression as "annual defensive ones" while staging them after keeping huge nuclear war hardware close to the DPRK's gate for decades.
					
					 How can the largest-ever nuclear war maneuvers aimed to mount a preemptive strike at the headquarters of the other party and its strategic bases and "bring down the regime" be "defensive ones"?
					
					 The Key Resolve joint military exercises for aggression are a clear declaration of war against the DPRK.
					
					 We had already clarified that the Korean  Armistice Agreement would be completely nullified, all agreements on the north-south non-aggression be totally scrapped and second and third strong practical countermeasures be taken in succession from March 11 when the nuclear war maneuvers of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces to invade the DPRK enter a full-dress stage.
					
					 They have challenged the DPRK's ultimatum with their reckless saber-rattling, totally abrogating the AA and agreements on non-aggression, the minimum mechanisms for deterring a war. The complete collapse of this mechanism for averting a war has caused the situation on the peninsula to lead to the outbreak of a war, unhindered. This grave situation clearly proves that the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces have escalated the tension on the peninsula, deliberately taking issue with the DPRK's legitimate satellite launch for peaceful purposes and its nuclear test, a just measure for self-defence, for the purpose of provoking a war of aggression against the DPRK. It, at the same time, clearly indicates that the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces are chieftains of a war and arch disturbers of peace on the peninsula.
					
					 The DPRK's option has become clearer as they kicked off the above-said drills for aggression against it.
					
					 It is the invariable stand and will of the army and people of the DPRK to counter enemies coming in attack with a dagger with a sword, a rifle with an artillery piece and nukes with precision nuclear strike means of Korean style more powerful than them.
					
					 The hearts of our service persons and people are burning with the will to annihilate the enemies and all of them are now seeking a way to give vent to their pent-up grudge against them.
					
					 All service personnel and people of the DPRK and all its offensive means including sophisticated nuclear strike means are in place for a final offensive for national reunification as it had already declared.
					
					 All strike means of the DPRK have already been put on alert and when they open fire, everything will turn into a sea in flames.
					
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK have turned out as one in an all-out action. If the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet forces dare fire even a shell on the inviolable territory, seas and air of the DPRK, its army and people will not miss the golden chance but blow up the strongholds of invasion through merciless strikes and achieve the national reunification, the long-cherished desire of the nation.
					
					 Intolerable is the lawless society under the reign of the U.S. high-handed and arbitrary practices.
					
					 The DPRK will sternly punish all unjust provocateurs and aggressors with arms for justice.
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean puppet forces are wholly to blame for all the ensuing catastrophic consequences from this moment.

articles.title: Choe Yong Rim Inspects Sports Village
articles.content:
Choe Yong Rim Inspects Sports Village
 Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Choe Yong Rim made a field survey of sports village in Chongchun Street.
					 He went round various places of the sports village including the Basketball Gymnasium and Table-Tennis Gymnasium seething with the drive to implement the on-spot teachings given by the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Choe underscored the need to successfully remodel the village as required by the new century.
					
					 He stressed that to successfully remodel the village into a comprehensive sports and cultural center is an important work to carry out the behests of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and instruction of Kim Jong Un and discussed the measures for relevant sectors to rise up in this work.
					
					 Earlier, he looked round the Water Culture Greenhouse of the Pyongyang Vegetable Science Institute to learn about the production of vegetables in winter and underscored the need to put the cultivation of vegetables on a scientific basis. 
					
					 A consultative meeting took place on the spot. Discussed there were measures for relevant units to positively supply raw materials needed for normal operation of the institute and to raise the performance of geotherm pumps and rationalize manpower management.

articles.title: Army-People Rallies Support Statement of KPA Supreme Command
articles.content:
Army-People Rallies Support Statement of KPA Supreme Command
 Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- Army-people rallies were held in North Hwanghae and South Hamgyong provinces and Nampho City on Monday in support of the statement issued by a spokesman for the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 Present there were officials of the local party, armed forces and power organs and working people's organizations, service persons of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials and other people of industrial establishments and co-op farms and teachers and students of universities and colleges.
					
					 The statement was read out at each rally.
					
					 Then followed speeches.
					
					 The speakers expressed support for the statement, noting that it reflected the will of all service personnel and people of the DPRK to conclude as early as possible the final decisive battle against the brigandish U.S. imperialists keen to infringe upon its dignity and sovereignty at any cost and their faith to win a sure victory.
					
					 The DPRK's third underground nuclear test was a very just step for self-defence to cope with the vicious anti-DPRK moves of the U.S. and all other hostile forces which labeled the DPRK's launch of satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2 illegal, they stressed.
					
					 They branded the U.S. imperialists as the thrice-cursed  sworn enemy as they prodded the UN Security Council again into adopting a "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK over its underground nuclear test, while staging madcap joint military exercises to invade it.
					
					 The U.S. heinous hostile policy toward the DPRK designed to bring down the ideology and system chosen by its people by disarming it and stifling it economically is bound to go bust, they declared.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK never make an empty talk but do what they determined to do, the speakers noted.
					
					 They will make a strike of justice at any target anytime as it pleases without limit, and surely achieve the great cause of the country's reunification, the cherished desire of the nation, stressed the speakers.

articles.title: Anti-US Sentiments Soar Higher in DPRK
articles.content:
Anti-US Sentiments Soar Higher in DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- Anti-U.S. sentiments are running higher in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea as the U.S. revealed its scheme to stifle it through the joint military exercises Key Resolve and Foal Eagle.
					 Under the grave situation caused by the U.S. imperialists and their allied forces, civilians of the DPRK as well as servicepersons have gone into full readiness for action, only to wait for an order of declaration of war.
					
					 Seen in streets across the country are people in combat uniforms and vehicles clad with camouflage nets.
					
					 Ji Yong Nam, a section chief at the North Hamgyong Provincial People's Hospital, told KCNA:
					
					 "The hospital has pressed ahead with preparations for wartime medical treatment.
					
					 It is so hateful that the country's peaceful development has been faced with challenges by the U.S. imperialists' war provocation moves. Their war drills should be countered with a sacred war of retaliation."
					
					 Paek Kwang Ho, a work-team head of the Pyongyang Electric Cable Factory 326, said:
					
					 "I was so surprised at the news that Supreme Commander Marshal Kim Jong Un inspected again the Jangjae Islet Defence Detachment and Mu Islet Heroic Defence Detachment, located in the biggest hotspot in the southernmost part of the southwestern area of the front.
					
					 As a discharged soldier, I'll join a frontline military unit to fight the provokers in the van, once an order is given by the Supreme Commander."

articles.title: DPRK People in War Posture
articles.content:
DPRK People in War Posture
 Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- Upon receiving the statement issued by a spokesman for the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army (KPA), the DPRK servicepersons and civilians now keep themselves in a war posture, only waiting for an order from Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un.
					 The army groups on the front and the ground, naval, air and anti-air and strategic rocket forces of the KPA, the Worker-Peasant Red Guards and the Young Red Guards have already launched an all-out action in line with the operational plan finally approved by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The whole country turned out to be frontline areas.
					
					 Party and working people's organizations held emergency meetings all at once, in which they discussed in detail a series of tasks to be fulfilled in wartime, calling for maintaining combat readiness.
					
					 People from all walks of life in different parts of the country, irrespective of ages and sex, volunteered joining or rejoining the Korean People's Army, with their strong will to wipe out the provokers, the U.S. imperialists and their allied forces, including the south Korean puppet forces.

articles.title: Army and People of DPRK Pledge Revenge on Provokers
articles.content:
Army and People of DPRK Pledge Revenge on Provokers
 Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- Enemies challenging the cause of justice are now making the last-ditch efforts.
					 Reverberating far and wide are the loud shouts of the army and people of the DPRK to punish the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces, who are going reckless like a puppy knowing no fear of a tiger in their hostile acts against the DPRK and the moves to provoke a nuclear war against it, and achieve a final victory.
					
					 Korean People's Army officer Kim Yong Il said that the spirit of Mt. Paektu army is running high in the all-out confrontation with the U.S. imperialists and their allies. He went on:
					
					 The reality clearly proves that justice can win a victory when it is accompanied by strength.
					
					 Settlement of accounts with the brigandish U.S. imperialists must be done with arms, not with words to safeguard justice as they regard the jungle law as the mode of existence.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will never remain an on-looker even by allowing its right to existence and supreme interests to be violated.
					
					 If the U.S. finally opts for a war of aggression, not properly understanding the Korean people, the just arms of the DPRK will blast the strongholds of the enemies and win a final victory in the show-down with the U.S.
					
					 This is the unshakable will and declaration of the army of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 Kim Jong Hyok, chairman of the youth league committee of the Pyongyang Thermal Power Complex, said that all the youth of the complex have turned out as one in a sacred war to take revenge on the enemies who are going reckless in kicking up a military frenzy.
					
					 He said that the U.S. imperialists and other hostile forces got the UN Security Council to adopt a "resolution on sanctions" again in violation of international law and have escalated their moves to isolate and stifle the DPRK.
					
					 The grim situation clearly proves that the DPRK was very just when it made the option for self-defence by beefing up the nuclear deterrence defying the enemies' ceaseless challenges and pressure.
					
					 However desperate the enemies may be, we will keep to the road of independence, the road of Songun chosen by us.
					
					 The young vanguard are replete with the firm pledge to display the stamina of the Korean youth in an all-out showdown with the sworn enemy U.S. imperialists just like those heroes in the 1950s, including Ri Su Bok and Kang Ho Yong dedicated their youth and lives.
					
					 We, youth fully support the statement of the spokesman for the Supreme Command of the KPA which stated that it would take more powerful and practical second and third countermeasures in succession against the war maniacs, and defend the sacred dignity of the country at the cost of their lives.
					
					 Rim Un Hyok, student of Kim Hyong Jik University of Education, said that he is full of will to hold the arms of revolution again and resolutely and mercilessly punish those who seek to encroach upon the inviolable sovereignty and the supreme interests of the country.
					
					 To look back on history, there were not a few countries and nations which lost the state rights and were subject to humiliation being caught in the whirlwind of upheaval overnight because of their weak state power, he said, and continued:
					
					 Under the wise guidance of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, the DPRK has pushed forward the drive for building a thriving nation under the uplifted banner of independence despite unprecedented trials and hardships and thus become a world-level military power equipped with nuclear deterrence for self-defence no one dares provoke.
					
					 More powerful than A-bombs is the single-minded unity of the army and people of the DPRK around the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un, matchless commander of Mt. Paektu. 
					
					 Only victory is in store for the army and people of the DPRK who are all out in the just cause under the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Un, the peerlessly great man.

articles.title: DPRK Stamp Marks 150th Anniversary of ICRC
articles.content:
DPRK Stamp Marks 150th Anniversary of ICRC
 Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- A new kind of stamp was issued in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea to mark the 150th anniversary of the International Committee of the Red Cross.
					 The stamp pictures the emblem and building of the International Committee of the Red Cross, with letters "In Commemoration of 150th Anniversary of ICRC" in its upper part.
					
					 The DPRK Red Cross Society was founded in October Juche 35 (1946). It received recognition from the International Committee of the Red Cross on February 2, 1956 and joined the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies on May 11 that year.

articles.title: DPRK Experiences Exceptionally Warm Weather
articles.content:
DPRK Experiences Exceptionally Warm Weather
 Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- The Democratic People's Republic of Korea experienced extremum air temperature on March 9-10.
					 On March 9, the amplitude of temperature between the highest and the lowest was nearly 20 degrees Celsius in the western coastal and northern inland areas of the country.
					
					 The highest temperature in Pyongyang was 20.5 degrees C., Kaesong 21.1℃, Phyongsong 20.2℃, Sariwon 19.8℃, Kanggye and Hyesan 16.6℃ and Sinuiju 14.5℃.
					
					 Such abnormal weather was also witnessed on March 10.
					
					 The sharp rise in temperature was due to the very dry and warm air that flew into the Korean Peninsula from southern China.
					
					 Meanwhile, winds at a speed of 10 to 15 meters per second swept most western coastal area, northern inland area and some areas of North Hamgyong Province from Saturday noon.

articles.title: Premier League under Way in DPRK
articles.content:
Premier League under Way in DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- A premier league tournament takes place here as part of the Mangyongdae Prize Sports Games, which is held annually on the occasion of the Day of the Sun (April 15), the birthday of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The tournament, which runs at Kim Il Sung Stadium and Sosan Football Stadium from March 1 to early April, is competed by 12 men's football teams and 12 women's football teams from April 25, Mangyongbong, Amnokgang, Sobaeksu, Ponghwasan and other local sports teams.
					
					 As the first premier league for this year, it has come under professional and public spotlight.

articles.title: Second Korean War Is Unavoidable
articles.content:
Second Korean War Is Unavoidable
 Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- The Korean Peninsula is now on the brink of war due to the tightened political, economic and military pressure of the U.S. and its allied forces on the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 Upset by the fact that the DPRK has smoothly been building a thriving socialist nation despite the persistent blockade on the part of the imperialist allied forces, the United States prodded the UN to adopting a "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK, terming its peaceful satellite launch "development of long-range missile".
					
					 When the DPRK conducted its underground nuclear test of higher level in face of their ganger-like action, the U.S. and its followers invented a new UN "resolution on additional sanctions", which is aimed to overthrow the leadership and socialist system of the DPRK.
					
					 The "resolution" stipulates for checkup of the DPRK's airplanes, vessels, government employees and institutions abroad. This is just a wanton violation of its sovereignty and dignity, and it is as good as giving a green light to the second Korean War.
					
					 It totally denies the DPRK's self-defensive right and provides a pretext to stamp out it, while paving a way for openly launching military actions under the signboard of "nuclear nonproliferation".
					
					 In reality, the U.S. and its allied forces, including the south Korean puppet army, kicked off on March 1 Foal Eagle and Key Resolve joint military exercises, aimed at preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK, throughout south Korea. Involved in the exercises, which has been staged on a full scale from Monday, are super-large nuclear-powered carrier task force carrying nuclear warheads, B-52H and other huge war means of the U.S. forces for making ground, sea and air nuclear strikes and its allied forces including south Korea, U.K. and Australia. The south Korean puppet brasshats went the lengths of making such reckless anti-DPRK remarks as "removal of the north's regime from the earth".
					
					 In face of the prevailing situation, the DPRK took tough countermeasures one after another. It declared that it would take strong counteractions in succession, void the Korean Armistice Agreement and all agreements on nonaggression between the north and the south and the joint declaration on denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula, put a total halt to the operation of the Panmunjom mission of the Korean People's Army and cut off the north-south hotline in Panmunjom. It also expressed its will to exercise its right to making preemptive nuclear strike on the bases of the aggressors.
					
					 The important measures have enjoyed full support from all the servicepersons and civilians of the country, who are eagerly awaiting an order for the start of a sacred war for national reunification.
					
					 Army-people rallies took place in different parts of the country to harden their resolve to devotedly defend the country, rallied closer around their leader. Displayed in streets, villages, factories and farms, schools and all other parts of the country are slogan-boards and posters carrying such letters as "The respected Supreme Commander, just give us your order!", "Deal a sledgehammer blow at those encroaching upon our sovereignty!" and "Punish the aggressors without mercy and achieve national reunification!".
					
					 The army groups on the front, ground, naval, air and anti-air and strategic rocket units of the Korean People's Army, the Worker-Peasant Red Guards and the Young Red Guards have already launched an all-out action in line with the operational plan finally approved by Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The Supreme Command of the KPA declared that the Armistice Agreement, which has existed for form's sake, would be completely invalid from March 11.
					
					 The world will witness how the DPRK wins in the fight against the aggression of the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces.

articles.title: US, UNSC to Be Accountable for Grave Consequences: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
US, UNSC to Be Accountable for Grave Consequences: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- The Polish Branch of the Korean Friendship Association made public a statement on Mar. 3 in denunciation of the U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The joint military exercises Key Resolve and Foal Eagle kicked off by the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces are aimed at preempting a nuclear attack on the DPRK.
					
					 In the light of their scale and form the on-going  military exercises can never be regarded as "defensive" ones.
					
					 The war hardware involved in them are enough to betray their aggressive and dangerous nature.
					
					 The fact clearly proves that those joint military exercises are intended to train the U.S. forces to bring down socialist Korea and occupy the whole of Korea in the end.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces are staging war maneuvers, terming the DPRK's satellite launch for peaceful purposes and 3rd nuclear test for self-defence "provocations" and "threat". The UNSC, however, is neither taking issue with this potential threat to the world peace nor referring to any sanction over it.  
					
					 It is the height of hypocrisy and deception.
					
					 We demand an immediate stop to the military exercises for aggression and urge the UNSC to lift all its "sanctions" against the DPRK at once.

articles.title: DPRK's Measure for Defending Its Sovereignty Is Just: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
DPRK's Measure for Defending Its Sovereignty Is Just: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- Now that the hostile forces have gone beyond the danger line in their moves to violate the sovereignty and dignity of the DPRK, clear is the option to be taken by it and it is just, says Rodong Sinmun in a bylined article on Monday.
					 It continues:
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will never remain an onlooker to the situation in which the sovereignty and dignity of the nation are being violated and the supreme interests of the country threatened.
					
					 The crucial measures taken by the DPRK in succession are the exercise of the right to self-defence to cope with the actions hostile to it.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will never make empty words as in the past.
					
					 It is the mettle of Songun Korea to do what it is determined to do, and it is also the spirit of its army and people to win a victory without fail once the fight is begun.
					
					 The history, in which the country won the two revolutionary wars and covered the path of victory despite all sorts of hardships, clearly proves it.
					
					 The DPRK will repulse the U.S. imperialists coming in attack with nukes by dint of its own precision nuclear striking means which have been diversified.
					
					 The U.S. and its allies must make a responsible option.
					
					 They would be well advised to bear in mind that irrevocable consequences will be entailed if they persistently resort to the dangerous actions to violate the sovereignty and security of the DPRK on the Korean Peninsula in which the Armistice Agreement was completely scrapped, not properly understanding the meaning of the recent countermeasures taken by it.
					
					 Its army and people ready to turn out in the final decisive fight to defend its sovereignty and dignity will deal a merciless annihilating blow at the aggressors by the Paektusan-style counteraction.

articles.title: "Sanctions" against DPRK Precisely Mean War Action: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
"Sanctions" against DPRK Precisely Mean War Action: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- The U.S.-led collective "sanctions" against the DPRK precisely mean a declaration of war and a war action against the DPRK, says Rodong Sinmun in a bylined article Monday.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The "sanctions" and war are unjust means employed by one country to force other country to accept its policy and intention.
					
					 Such "sanctions", which the U.S. adopted by abusing the UN Security Council, are unethical criminal acts to attain its goal of aggression by threatening not only the DPRK's sovereignty but its vital rights. It is, therefore, little short of a war action.
					
					 What is more serious is that the U.S. cooked up such "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK against the backdrop of the on-going Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises.
					
					 This clearly indicates that the U.S. "sanctions" against the DPRK are leading to acts of aggression backed by military force, going beyond the nature of normal sanctions.
					
					 Such collective "sanctions" are bound to lead to a war.
					
					 That is why the army and people of the DPRK regard the collective "sanctions" as a declaration of war and an indiscriminate war action against it.
					
					 They have launched an all-state and an all-people action against the U.S. to cope with those "sanctions" and moves for a war of aggression.
					
					 The world will clearly witness how the army and people of the DPRK will foil such sanctions and war moves and how they will protect the dignity and position as a nuclear weapons state and satellite launcher.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Holds US Responsible for Reducing AA to Dead Paper
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Holds US Responsible for Reducing AA to Dead Paper
 Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- The truce mechanism on the Korean Peninsula has been destroyed. This is attributable to the ceaseless moves of the U.S. and its puppet south Korean regime for a war of aggression against the DPRK.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes this in a bylined article.
					
					 It cites facts to prove that the U.S. reduced the Armistice Agreement (AA) to a dead paper and has used it as a signboard for intensifying the war maneuvers against the DPRK, extremely increasing the danger of a new war on the peninsula.
					
					 This situation made it clear that  the DPRK can no longer remain a passive onlooker to the daily increasing danger of a war, bound to the AA, says the article, adding:
					
					 That's why the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army (KPA) declared invalid the AA that has existed only in name at a time when the enemies' war maneuvers entered a full scale.
					
					 A spokesman for the KPA Supreme Command in a statement declared that it would make a strike of justice at any target anytime, not bound to the AA, and achieve the national reunification, the cherished desire of the Korean nation. 
					
					 This is an expression of the DPRK's revolutionary armed forces' will to fight a final battle, no longer tolerating the enemies' moves for aggression.
					
					 The DPRK is a full-fledged possessor of strategic rockets and nuclear weapons for self-defence and fully ready for all war modes.
					
					 There will be no longer truce in the final showdown with the hostile forces. The U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces will be left with no option but to make an unconditional surrender.

articles.title: S. Korean Forces' Anti-DPRK "Human Rights Campaign" Slammed
articles.content:
S. Korean Forces' Anti-DPRK "Human Rights Campaign" Slammed
 Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- The U.S. has put into motion the hand-raising machines of the UN in a bid to fabricate a "resolution" on setting up an organization for investigating "human rights" situation in the DPRK.
					 The south Korean puppet forces are actively supporting their U.S. master, touting "active participation" and "international cooperation".
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday in a bylined commentary brands this as a deliberate and planned provocation to stoke tensions and launch a war of aggression against the DPRK while eliciting international cooperation against the DPRK.
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces are human rights criminals who brought the U.S. imperialist aggression troops ill famed for massacre to south Korea and turned the whole of south Korea into a barren land of democracy and human rights and a hell by pursuing harsh fascist dictatorial rule, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 It is illogical for the poor puppet forces of south Korea, which left their sovereignty to the tender mercy of the U.S. and are unable to plead their sad situation in which the aggressors violate the people's life and security at their will, to pull up the DPRK over its "human rights".
					
					 The south Korean forces' anti-DPRK "human rights" campaign is, in essence, an act of treachery aimed to expand their disgraceful colonial rule to the northern half of Korea.
					
					 However desperate the puppet forces may be, they can never bring down the most advantageous Korean-style socialist system which defends and adds shine to the sovereignty and dignity of the people at the highest level.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK who have turned out as one in an all-out showdown of justice for defending the sovereignty and dignity of the nation will deal a merciless sledge-hammer blow at the group of traitors who stoop to any infamy to harm the fellow countrymen.

articles.title: Key Resolve Kicked Off
articles.content:
Key Resolve Kicked Off
 Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet warmongers kicked off the Key Resolve joint military exercises against the DPRK on Monday despite the unanimous denunciation and warning at home and abroad.
					 The drills are aimed to rapidly deploy the reinforced U.S. imperialist aggressor forces in case of contingency on the Korean Peninsula. Involved there are various type preemptive nuclear strike means, including nuclear carrier, latest Stealth fighters, and even armed forces of the UK, Australia, Canada and other countries under the pretext of their participation in the June 25 war.
					
					 The joint war maneuvers entered a full-dress stage with the start of Key Resolve.
					
					 The warmongers are fanning up war fever, blustering that they would be ready to go into action promptly in case anyone provokes.
					
					 The escalating reckless saber-rattling of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet warmongers is bringing the dark clouds of a nuclear war to hang over the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: S. Korean Organizations Demand Halt to Joint Military Exercises
articles.content:
S. Korean Organizations Demand Halt to Joint Military Exercises
 Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Progress, the Missionary Solidarity Council of Christian Society and other organizations of south Korea held an emergency press conference in Seoul on March 7 demanding a halt to the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises.
					 At the conference the organizations said the U.S. and the south Korean authorities are staging such large-scale war maneuvers as Key Resolve and Foal Eagle on the Korean Peninsula where military tension remains very acute, arousing serious concern.
					
					 If such situation is allowed to persist, a war is unavoidable, they held.
					
					 They demanded an immediate stop to the military actions of increasing the danger of a nuclear war.
					
					 They, at the same time, demanded the U.S. roll back its failed policy of pressure upon the DPRK, cancel its joint war exercises with south Korea and pull its forces out of south Korea as early as possible.
					
					 They voiced strong opposition to the war forces of south Korea pursuing a policy of confrontation with fellow countrymen while crying out for "preemptive strike".
					
					 They declared that they would take an active part in the actions to protect the security of the fellow countrymen and achieve peace on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: US-S. Korea Joint Military Drills Assailed by S. Korean Opposition Party
articles.content:
US-S. Korea Joint Military Drills Assailed by S. Korean Opposition Party
 Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- The Unified Progressive Party, an opposition party of south Korea, disclosed the aggressive nature of Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military drills.
					 The Progressive Policy Institute of the party in its commentary on March 8 said that the on-going military drills are apparently aimed at invading the north as they are staged according to OPLAN 5027 and OPLAN 5029.
					
					 Even natural disasters are included in the "case of emergency" in OPLAN 5029 as a pretext for invading the north, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 It is quite unreasonable to say that the drills are "defensive ones" as cutting-edge nuclear strike means are being involved in the drills to get the troops master the relevant procedures. 
					
					 The mounting danger of war is attributable to fragile armistice mechanism, and the UN Security Council's act to authorize the U.S.-proposed "sanctions" over the north's satellite launch has become a catalyst.
					
					 The floor leader of the Unified Progressive Party said on March 7 that the authorities are calling the military drills ones of "defensive nature" but in actuality they are pursuant to a plan to cross the Military Demarcation Line and occupy the north.
					
					 A parliamentary spokesman for the party in a commentary said it is a self-evident fact that the UN Security Council's "resolution on sanctions" has strained tensions, branding it as an act of touching off crisis, away from a method of peaceful settlement.

articles.title: S. Korean Organizations Demand Stop to North-targeted War Exercises
articles.content:
S. Korean Organizations Demand Stop to North-targeted War Exercises
 Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- The Farmers, Media, Women, Youth and Students and Academic Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration held a press conference on March 8 in front of the U.S. embassy in Seoul at which they made public a joint statement demanding the U.S. imperialists and south Korean warmongers immediately  halt the dangerous war exercises against the north.
					 The statement said the tension on the Korean Peninsula is further escalating since the U.S. and its allies' fabrication of "resolutions on sanctions" against the DPRK over its satellite launch for peaceful purposes and nuclear test for self-defence.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 Key Resolve war exercises envisage a war on the Korean Peninsula as they are aimed at bolstering the capability for effectively deploying the reinforced U.S. forces in contingency on the peninsula and conducting organized and coordinated operations. 
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean "government" have let their forces, etc. stage ceaseless war drills for occupying areas of the north under the simulated conditions of "contingency" there.
					
					 It is a fact well known to the world that such endless war exercises premised on a nuclear attack on the north in case of emergency compelled the north to have access to nuclear deterrent. 
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean "government" are sadly mistaken if they calculate they can bring down the north by military force. 
					
					 The statement urged the U.S. not to lead the situation on the Korean Peninsula to a war in its interest but immediately halt the dangerous war exercises against the north.
					
					 If the U.S. and south Korean warmongers persistently pay no heed to this demand, they will face strong resistance of all Koreans desirous of peace on the peninsula, warned the statement.

articles.title: S. Korean Papers Ridicule Lee Myung Bak Fated to Stand Trial
articles.content:
S. Korean Papers Ridicule Lee Myung Bak Fated to Stand Trial
 Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- The south Korean newspapers Hangyore and Kyunghyang Daily News on March 5 in their editorials ridiculed traitor Lee Myung Bak fated to stand trial for all evils and scandals committed during his office.
					 The editorials recalled that Lee is to stand trial as soon as he was ousted.
					
					 The Citizens Solidarity for Genuine Democracy and other organizations filed suits in the prosecution against the scandals committed by Lee and his family.
					
					 Lee was censured by public opinions for various kinds of scandals in the whole period of his office and typical among them were the case of purchasing a housing lot in Naegok-dong, the case of illegal surveillance on civilians and the BBK stock price manipulation, the editorials said.
					
					 One should neither cover up nor shut one's eyes to the disclosed suspicions, the editorials held, demanding the prosecution authorities make a thoroughgoing investigation into all scandals related to Lee Myung Bak.
					
					 The prosecution authorities should bear in mind that the people will never pardon them if they gloss over the scandals and Lee's family should no longer intend to shun the legal judgment, warned the editorials.

articles.title: Chongryon Supports Statement of KPA Supreme Command
articles.content:
Chongryon Supports Statement of KPA Supreme Command
 Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- Nam Sung U, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), issued a statement on Mar. 8 in support of the statement issued by a spokesman for the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 The statement fully reflects the unshakable faith of the people in the homeland to protect their independent dignity to the last and settle accounts with those seeking to hurt it through tougher counteractions, the statement said, adding:
					
					 The anti-DPRK actions of the U.S. and its followers have reached an extreme phase.
					
					 They kicked off at last Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises to stifle the DPRK on March 1 despite the strong protest and condemnation at home and abroad.
					
					 The important measures taken by the DPRK are entirely just countermeasures to safeguard the sovereignty of the nation and supreme interests of the country.
					
					 What touches off towering national indignation among the  Koreans in Japan is the reckless remarks made by the south Korean puppet forces steeped in submission and sycophancy towards the U.S., the statement noted, blasting them for crying out for "striking at the base of provocation" and "pre-emptive attack," leading the situation to a war of aggression  against the DPRK. 
					
					 It went on:
					
					 How can we remain a passive onlooker to such situation that the national sovereignty and dignity are being infringed upon and the supreme interests of the country threatened by the group of traitors, lackeys of the U.S.?
					
					 Chongryon and Koreans in Japan are more keenly aware than anybody else that independence is what keeps nation alive and the happiness and future of the overseas compatriots are guaranteed by the prosperity of the DPRK which has won victories and demonstrated its dignity thanks to independence.
					
					 Firmly convinced that a final victory is in store for the Korean people led by the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un, they will resolutely safeguard the national sovereignty and the country's supreme dignity.

articles.title: Memorial Service for Korean Victims of US Massive Air Raid on Tokyo Held
articles.content:
Memorial Service for Korean Victims of US Massive Air Raid on Tokyo Held
 Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- A memorial service for Korean victims was held at the Tokyo metropolitan memorial hall on March 2 68 years since U.S. forces' massive air raid on Tokyo. 
					 Present there were officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) including Pak Ku Ho, vice-chairman of its Central Standing Committee and concurrently chairman of its Rights and Welfare Committee, Hwang Myong, chairman of its Tokyo Metropolitan Headquarters, Koreans in Japan and citizens of Japan.
					
					 As known, more than ten thousand Koreans who had been forcibly drafted by the Japanese imperialists were killed in the U.S. forces' massive air raid in March, 1945.
					
					 The participants paid silent tribute to the victims.
					
					 Speeches were made by a pastor of the Japanese Christian order, a member of the Tokyo Metropolitan Assembly, a representative of the Tokyo Dietmen's League for the Promotion of Japan-Korea Friendship and others.
					
					 Recalling that Koreans in Japan were subject to double and treble sufferings, they called for ushering in a peaceful era free from war.
					
					 Introduced there were memorial messages from the Committee on Measures for Former Korean "Comfort Women" for the Imperial Japanese Army and Drafting Victims, the committee for investigating damage done by Japan through forcible mobilization during resistance against it and supporting victims of forcible mobilization abroad, etc. from south Korea.

articles.title: Anniversary of General Association of Koreans in China Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of General Association of Koreans in China Marked
 Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held in Shenyang, China on March 6 to mark the 22nd anniversary of the formation of the General Association of Koreans in China and the International Women's Day. 
					 Present there were officials of the association, officials of the regional associations including the Liaoning Regional Association and Koreans in Shenyang City.
					
					 Choe Su Bong, vice-chairperson of the association, made a speech.
					
					 Over the last 22 years since its birth in March, 1991, the association has conducted a strenuous patriotic work, keeping pace with the compatriots in the homeland, true to the idea of the overseas compatriots movement of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, the chairperson said, adding:
					
					 The association established a regular organizational mechanism and has conducted a dynamic patriotic campaign, a campaign to find out compatriots to rally Koreans in China around the organization.
					
					  The association has achieved successes in the work for positively supporting the compatriots in the homeland in their drive to build a thriving nation and accomplish the cause of national reunification.
					
					 The association will as ever remain true to the idea and leadership of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un, holding the Generalissimos in high esteem forever.
					
					 Then, an amusement game took place on the occasion of the International Women's Day.

articles.title: Key Resolve, Foal Eagle Assailed by Koreans in China
articles.content:
Key Resolve, Foal Eagle Assailed by Koreans in China
 Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China issued a statement on March 9 denouncing the U.S. imperialists for their frantic nuclear war maneuvers against the DPRK.
					 Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint war exercises kicked off by the U.S. and its allies including the south Korean puppet warmongers are nuclear war drills and three-dimensional preliminary war aimed to mount a preemptive attack on the DPRK from A to Z, the statement said.
					
					 It accused the U.S. of seeking to find the way-out from serious situation at home in igniting the second Korean war.
					
					 It branded the U.S. as the arch criminal and chieftain threatening peace and security.
					
					 Now that the U.S. intends to unleash a nuclear war, the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK are left with no option but to exercise the right to preemptive nuclear strike at the strongholds of aggressors in order to protect the supreme interests of the country, it noted.
					
					 If the U.S. ignites a war finally, the ferocious aggressors will perish in the flames of justice that will flare up like a volcano and this will end in removing the cursed Military Demarcation Line, it said.
					
					 The Liaoning Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China issued a statement on the same day condemning the warmongers for their madcap nuclear war moves.
					
					 The statement warned the U.S. imperialists and their allies not to act rashly.

articles.title: US-S. Korean War Maneuvers under Fire by Koreans' Body in US
articles.content:
US-S. Korean War Maneuvers under Fire by Koreans' Body in US
 Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- The U.S. Regional Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification released a statement on Mar. 8 in denunciation of the U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises to invade the north.
					 Accusing the U.S. and south Korean warmongers of staging large-scale war maneuvers for invading the north, the statement noted that they are aimed at stifling the north by force.
					
					 60 years after the war show that the north is such strong country that no force can ever bring it to its knees or topple it as it is fully prepared mentally and equipped with physical means, it noted, adding:
					
					 Such war drills will only convince people all over the world of the ugly true colors of the U.S.
					
					 It ridicules the south Korean military group which is crying out for a "preemptive strike" at the north.
					
					 What such annual war drills bring to people is nothing but war threat and horror, said the statement, adding that all Koreans should know well who is inciting war and bringing the dark clouds of war to hang over the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The north's nuclear deterrent serves as a means to protect the sovereignty of the country and ensure security in both the north and the south.
					
					 It called on all Koreans to pool efforts for averting a war and achieving peace.

articles.title: US Urged to Opt for Dialogue with DPRK
articles.content:
US Urged to Opt for Dialogue with DPRK
Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- Yang Un Sik, permanent chairman of the U.S. Regional Committee of the Overseas Side Committee for Implementing the Juche 15 Joint Declaration, on March 7 released a statement titled "U.S., stop military drills and opt for dialogue with north side".
					 The Korean Peninsula is exposed to the greatest danger of war since the June 25 war, the statement said, adding: This is explained by Key Resolve and Foal Eagle north-targeted war maneuvers which started on March 1 and will last till April 30.
					
					 The U.S. administration was seized with the wild ambition to "achieve unification of Korea through absorption of the north" by such conspiratorial "strategy for collapse" as "strategic patience" in the past, it said, adding: This should not be allowed to repeat itself.
					
					 It urged the U.S. and its followers to discontinue cooking up the UN Security Council's "resolution on sanctions" aimed to wreck peace on the Korean Peninsula, and stop at once the joint military exercises.
					
					 It urged the present south Korean regime not to follow in the footsteps of the Lee Myung Bak regime but come out for north-south dialogue and U.S. President Obama to positively opt for DPRK-U.S. dialogue.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Peru
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Peru
 Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- A Peruvian preparatory committee to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was formed in Lima on Mar. 4.
					 Tani Baler Lopera, international secretary of the Communist Party of Peru (Red Motherland), was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 It decided to organize diverse political and cultural events including meeting, seminar and film show on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Finnish Political Figure Supports DPRK's Access to Nuclear Weapons
articles.content:
Finnish Political Figure Supports DPRK's Access to Nuclear Weapons
 Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- Kalevi Wahrman, chairman of the Finnish Communists' League, contributed an article to the Finnish paper Uusi Suomi titled "The reason why the DPRK had access to nuclear weapons" on Feb. 28.
					 Recalling that the DPRK conducted the 3rd underground nuclear test on Feb. 12, the article went on:
					
					 The motive and objective of the DPRK's nuclear test should be explained by the U.S. troops' presence in south Korea, the Korean War in the 1950s and the persistent U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK, it noted, and went on:
					
					 The U.S. hostile acts compelled the DPRK to have access to nuclear deterrent.
					
					 The DPRK proposed concluding a peace treaty with the U.S., but the latter has worked hard to stifle the former even by use of nuclear weapons.
					
					 The U.S. and its followers are not only posing a military threat to the DPRK but busy conducting a smear campaign against it, the article said, and continued: 
					
					 The U.S. far-fetchedly described the DPRK's satellite launch as a "threat" to the world peace though it is recognized by most countries of the world, and prodded the UN Security Council into fabricating a "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK.
					
					 This state of the DPRK-U.S. stand-off compelled the DPRK to make a switchover from the program for peaceful use of nuclear energy to a military purpose.
					
					 The DPRK's option was very fair and logic from the viewpoint of everybody.
					
					 The DPRK's dismantlement of its nukes is possible when the U.S. nuclear threat is defused.
					
					 The DPRK's access to nuclear weapons is not a threat to others but means defence of the sovereignty of the country and socialism and a guarantee of happy future of the people.

articles.title: Polish Organization Censures US-S. Korea War Exercises
articles.content:
Polish Organization Censures US-S. Korea War Exercises
 Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- The Polish Branch of the Korean Friendship Association made public a statement on Mar. 3 in denunciation of the U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The joint military exercises Key Resolve and Foal Eagle kicked off by the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces are aimed at preempting a nuclear attack on the DPRK.
					
					 In the light of their scale and form the on-going  military exercises can never be regarded as "defensive" ones.
					
					 The war hardware involved in them are enough to betray their aggressive and dangerous nature.
					
					 The fact clearly proves that those joint military exercises are intended to train the U.S. forces to bring down socialist Korea and occupy the whole of Korea in the end.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces are staging war maneuvers, terming the DPRK's satellite launch for peaceful purposes and 3rd nuclear test for self-defence "provocations" and "threat". The UNSC, however, is neither taking issue with this potential threat to the world peace nor referring to any sanction over it.  
					
					 It is the height of hypocrisy and deception.
					
					 We demand an immediate stop to the military exercises for aggression and urge the UNSC to lift all its "sanctions" against the DPRK at once.

articles.title: RPDC esta en estado de guerra
articles.content:
RPDC esta en estado de guerra
Pyongyang, 11 de marzo (ACNC) -- Al informarse de la declaracion del portavoz de la Comandancia Suprema del Ejercito Popular de Corea, todo el ejercito y el pueblo de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corease han levantado como un solo hombre en la sagrada resistencia nacional.
					 Todo el pais esta en el estado de guerra esperando solo la orden del Comandante Supremo Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Ya las unidades de las fuerzas terrestres, navales, aereas y antiaereas y de cohetes estrategicos del EPC, la Guardia Roja Obrero-Campesina y la Guardia Juvenil Roja ya se hallan en enfrentamiento total segun el plan operacional firmado finalmente por el Comandante Supremo del EPC.
					
					 Tambien todos los habitantes se han  preparado y todo el territorio se ha convertido en la primera linea del frente.
					
					  Las organizaciones del Partido y de trabajadores de todas las localidades realizaron a la vez las urgentes reuniones de consulta, las cuales no fueron las simples reuniones sino las de operacion en visperas de la batalla decisiva.
					
					  En las ocasiones fueron debatidos y resueltos en detalles todos los asuntos a ser cumplidos en el tiempo de guerra por todas las organizaciones del Partido segun el proposito operacional de la Comandancia Suprema.
					
					  Ademas el Comite Central de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung y otras organizaciones de masas organizan con escrupulosidad el trabajo organizativo y politico para mantenerse en estado de disposicion combativa.
					
					  Las organizaciones del Partido y de masas de todas las zonas del pais entraron en el estado de combate segun las decisiones de citadas reuniones.
					
					  En las provincias de Jagang, de Hamgyong del Sur, de Hwanghae del Norte y de Phyong-an del Sur, las ciudades de Pyongyang y Nampho y otras zonas todos los hombres y mujeres, ancianos y ninos solicitan el ingreso y reingreso al EPC.
					
					  Los obreros, campesinos, intelectuales, jovenes y ninos escolares que sentian jubilo de vida en los centros de trabajo  y estudio, ocuparon las posiciones de combate tomando en sus manos los fusiles.
					
					  Todos estos toman la decision de venganza de aniquilar en esta Tierra a todos los agresores, imperialistas yanquis, la banda de traidores surcoreanos y otras sucias fuerzas satelites.

articles.title: Premier coreano recorre villa deportiva de reparto Chongchun
articles.content:
Premier coreano recorre villa deportiva de reparto Chongchun
Pyongyang, 11 de marzo (ACNC) -- El primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea Choe Yong Rim recorrio la villa deportiva del reparto Chongchun.
					Pasando revista a varios lugares de la villa, incluyendo los centros de baloncesto y tenis de mesa visitados por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un, destaco la necesidad de reconstruirla conforme a la demanda del nuevo siglo.
					
					Subrayo que remodelar magnificamente la villa como la base deportivo-cultural integral es el trabajo importante para materializar los legados de los Generalisimos y las instrucciones del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, y se discutio los asuntos sobre las medidas para que los sectores correspondientes se levanten activamente en esta labor.
					
					Con anterioridad, Choe averiguo el estado de produccion de vegetales para la estacion invernal en el invernadero de cultivo acuatico del Instituto de Ciencia de Verduras de Pyongyang y se refirio a hacer cientifico el cultivo de las hortalizas. 
					
					En la reunion consultiva realizada en el mismo lugar se discutio las medidas para garantizar en las unidades correspondientes los materiales necesarios a la administracion normal del instituto, elevar la capacidad de la bomba geotermica y organizar racionalmente la administracion de manos de trabajo.

articles.title: Se registra en RPDC fenomeno de temperatura anormal
articles.content:
Se registra en RPDC fenomeno de temperatura anormal
Pyongyang, 11 de marzo (ACNC) -- Fue registrado los dias 9 y 10 en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea el fenomeno de temperatura anormal.
					El dia 9, la temperatura del mediodia se elevo aproximadamente a 20oC mas que la de manana en las zonas de la costa occidental y del interior septentrional.
					
					Fueron registrados 20.5oC en Pyongyang, 21.1oC en Kaesong, 20.2oC en Phyongsong, 19.8oC en Sariwon, 16.6oC en Kanggye y Hyesan y 14.5oC en Sinuiju, las cuales son las cifras mas altas despues de la observacion meteorologica. Esas temperaturas son 4oC-5oC mas altas que la temperatura polar registrada en 1960.
					
					Tal fenomeno ocurrio tambien el dia 10.
					
					Su causa reside en que el aire muy seco y templado afluyo a la Peninsula Coreana desde la zona meridional de China.
					
					Por otra parte, desde la tarde del dia 9 hubo un fuerte viento de mas de 10-15m/s en la mayoria de la zona de la costa occidental y en algunas zonas del interior septentrional y de la provincia de Hamgyong del Norte.

articles.title: Editado sello por dia de fundacion de Comite Internacional de Cruz Roja
articles.content:
Editado sello por dia de fundacion de Comite Internacional de Cruz Roja
Pyongyang, 11 de marzo (ACNC) -- En la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea se dio a luz un sello (un genero de sello individual) dedicado al 150o aniversario de la fundacion del Comite Internacional de la Cruz Roja.
					En la parte superior del sello estan escritas las letras "En conmemoracion del 150o aniversario de la fundacion del Comite Internacional de la Cruz Roja" y se ven la insignia y el edificio del dicho comite.
					
					La Asociacion de la Cruz Roja de Corea fue fundada en octubre del 35 (1946) de la Era Juche.
					
					Esta entidad recibio el 2 de febrero de 1956 el reconocimiento del Comite Internacional de la Cruz Roja y se ingreso el 11 de mayo del mismo ano a la Federacion Internacional de Sociedades de la Cruz Roja y la Medialuna Roja.
					
					Cumple con su mision y deber como entidad de salud publica, higiene y socorro a base del noble ideal humanitario y los principios fundamentales del movimiento de la Cruz Roja y la Medialuna Roja.
